login.title: Log in to SocialFénix
login.subtitle: Enter your email or username and password.

feed.title: DYNAMIC FEED
features: Real-time Feed - Content always fresh and instant.
Only What's Relevant - The most recent memories from your circle.
Dynamic Interactions - High engagement on every post.
Smart Notifications - Alerts that adapt to you.
Integrated Messaging - Instant and fluid communication.
Social Transparency – See the full list of users who liked or reposted.
Instant Search – Find friends and new connections quickly and easily.
Visual Care – Dark Mode to protect your eyes and enjoy maximum comfort.

comments.title: COMMENT THREADS
features: Deeply Nested Threads – Conversations organized up to 4 reply levels.
Quick Reactions - Express your opinion instantly with a like.

notifications.title: REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS
features: Instant Notifications – Stay informed of interactions at the exact moment.
At-a-Glance Design – Clear interface easy to scan visually.
Smart Grouping – We compact events to remove noise and notification spam.

profile.title: VIBRANT USER PROFILE
profile.desc: Brief explanation of the user profile.
features: Personal Brand Control – Full personalization (avatar, cover, bio and links).
Your Social Portfolio – Highlight all your activity: media, likes and interactions.
Clear Network Management – View and manage your connections (followers and following) easily.

chat.title: PRIVATE CONVERSATIONS
features: Live Chat – Fluid, instant communication with all your contacts.
Reliable Alerts – Instant notifications so you never miss the thread.
Full History – Access and resume past conversations instantly.
Time Context – Each message includes the exact time for greater clarity

signup.title: Create your account on SocialFénix
signup.subtitle: Sign up by filling these fields.

errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters.
errors.usernamePattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers and underscores (_).
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one lowercase, one uppercase, one number and one special character.
errors.duplicate: Username or email already in use.
errors.connection: Server connection error. Try again later.
